title: When an "Accept" pops in queue my client is disconnecting 5 seconds later ( every accept )
body: i can be in queue for 10 min but the moment i get an accept button it wont show me it ( it shows my party) and after i " dodge " it my client will disconnect for a few moments then go back up

replies.body: It's super important to resolve this, because continuous declines can put you in a lower priority queue.  Something might be going awry with your connection and failing to transition you from matchmaking into champion select.  I recommend starting with the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help rule out possibilities while improving the health of your connection.  Let me know if you have any questions!
i agree, i cannot play like this at all. i tried the hextech tool, the connection issues page.. everything. i need help cuz this is coming from the client itself not my internet

Hey, grab the logs provided by the hextech repair tool and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can take a closer look with you and find some more options!
